DESCRIPTION: The #yActive Ghostflame can be Ignited by meeting its listed Ignition requirements.
Move to the next Ghostflame. Moving onto a Ghostflame #yExtinguishes it.
Move to the previous Ghostflame. Moving onto a Ghostflame #yExtinguishes it.
Intensity increases the amount of damage, Soulburn, and Block applied by Ghostflames when Ignited.
After #b3 turns, a Soulburned enemy loses HP, removing the Soulburn effect.
Allows Ghostflame to become Ignited again, resetting its Ignition requirements.
Triggers the Ignition effect described on a Ghostflame.
If all #b6 Seals have been played this combat, obtain #pThe #pBroken #pSeal and remove the Seals from your deck.
If this card is Exhausted, its effects activate.
#yGhostflame. #yIgnites when #b2 #ySkills are played while #yActive. #yIgnition: When #yIgnited, deal #b4 damage to a random enemy twice.
#yGhostflame. #yIgnites when a #yPower is played while #yActive. #yIgnition: When #yIgnited, gain #b4 #yBlock and #b1 #yStrength.
#yGhostflame. #yIgnites when #b2 #yAttacks are played while #yActive. #yIgnition: When #yIgnited, apply #b4 #ySoulburn to a random enemy.
